posts.raw_content: These are houses that have had this shit up for YEARS. Telling that all of it came down in the same week. I know some of you are going to say the leftists are just "going into hiding", but even that is a positive development. I haven't put a trump bumper sticker on my car because I'm afraid of it getting keyed or my tires getting slashed. Up until now exactly zero left wing shitbags have felt any hesitation about spewing their toxic hate in the public square. Seems like some of them are thinking twice about that now. I think it's good if this very small, but very vocal minority shuts the fuck up for a while.
posts.author: proud_semi_fascist
posts.title: Update: Now every family on my street that had BLM, trans, gay or other left wing signs in their yards has taken them down. Last week I had only noticed one house. Interesting development.

posts.raw_content:
This black student was expelled for mocking Charlie Kirk's death in a public place and was caught on video.  His remarks were hateful and constituted HATE SPEECH BULLYING of other Christians and supporters of Charlie Kirk.  The left claims hate speech exists, but Charlie Kirk said it did not.  I agree.  Hate speech isn't a thing.  But BULLYING is, and its a violation of GOFUNDME's very own terms of service and community standards (specifically 8.2, 8.8, 8.9) 

This man is a "CRY BULLY" meaning he bullies others, promotes violence, endorses violence, endorsed the assassination of someone with whom he disagreed, and then mocked their death. 

Their campaign's fundraiser violated your 8.2 by having factually inaccurate information by omission.  Specifically, he omits the fact that he was expelled for bullying Charlie Kirk supporters by mocking Kirk's death.  He also used racial slurs and used a vape pen on campus which is a violation.  

The fundraiser violated 8.8, 8.9 of your own service by participating in EXTREMISM, bullying, harassment, and endorsing violence.  

By not including the video of the offenses leading to his expulsion, I conclude his omissions are weaponized omissions that paint him as an innocent black man using the false black victimhood card  in a fraudulent 8.8, and 8.1 violating way.  Here is a blaze article containing the video in question 

https://www.theblaze.com/news/student-who-mocked-charlie-kirks-assassination-got-expelled-now-begging-for-money-i-did-not-harm-anyone

Here is a link to the video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LkmNAVck4BU

This fundraiser claims he has not harmed anyone, but he's harmed HALF THE COUNTRY by adding to the voices of bullying and hatefulness around Charlie Kirk, adding to the numerous celebrity voices on X / Twitter glorifying his death, because they simply disagree with his opinions or his religion.  Or the fact that he's a young, white, successful Christian man.  (Or WAS until he was shot dead in the neck)

I am appealing to GoFundMe's higher sensibilities here and that if you truly believe in your own terms of service and community standards, you will not allow this person to escape accountability for the harm he has done to our nation.

Please delete his GoFundMe Campaign.  I am going to post this appeal in its entirety to various social media accounts so that GoFundMe will stay accountable and authentic to its patrons.  

Thank you.
